name: Avoid large Classes - too many Fields
description:
Classes should have less than X Fields.
The threshold is a parameter that can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all the Classes having more than X Fields.
It provides the following information:
 - Class full name
 - Number of Fields
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Classes should not have too many Fields.
remediation: Review the Class design to reduce the number of Fields
